headline.main: Red Rover, Red Rover, Send Recess Back Over

docs.abstract: Teacher Bennett Packman letter on December 10 article on lack of recess in New York City metropolitan area schools
docs.section_name: Education; New York and Region; Opinion
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: ''Before Children Ask, 'What's Recess?' '' (Dec. 10) is a sad commentary on the state of our educational leadership and administration. At a time when health care costs are out of control and childhood diabetes and obesity are increasing, the geniuses behind No Child Left Behind have created a system that requires a tradeoff of recess for test preparation.
